img_summary: The image depicts a stylized, two-tiered vase or container with a bulbous shape. It has a smooth surface with a gradient color scheme transitioning from dark blue to teal. The top of the vase features several pointed, orange-red elements protruding from its opening. The background is dark and blurred, focusing attention on the vase.
